0425 699 660

Hi Nichole,

Yes sure, here are the records that they need to add please:

TXT record
Name/host: _cf-custom-hostname
Value: 9eaf10f4-5a0d-4205-b757-859814dfd24f

CNAME record
Name/host: _acme-challenge
Domain name: scottinsuranceconsulting.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

A Record:
Name: @
IP Address: 162.159.134.42

A Record:
Name: www
IP Address: 162.159.134.42

Guys - thought I'd also send this below in case Heath isn't available.



Can you provide records needed to redirect below domain to aviso broking url noted below.



Thanks,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath


Hope you had a great weekend. See below, we've just acquired another business into Aviso Broking.


Need to redirect

https://scottinsuranceconsulting.com.au/

to this new URL/page:

https://avisobroking.com.au/scott-insurance-consulting-is-now-aviso-broking/



Does Josh need records provided on your side?
Thanks!
Nic


From: Josh Hall <josh.hall@edagroup.com.au>
Date: Monday, 14 August 2023 at 8:31 am
To: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Cc: Sahil Tulsiani <Sahil@envest.com.au>
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] DNS Record Update - URGENT

Domain now transferred.

The transfer also broke the DNS records. I've put in the records provided by Sensis - it shows an SSL error now when going to the website.

Do you have new records you want us to use Nichole?

Also they didn't include any MX/mail records - do they accept emails on @scottinsuranceconsulting.com.au?

Hi Nichole,

Hope you are well. Please note that we are not able to point our domain to an external website. You would need to transfer the domain scottinsuranceconsulting.com.au to your new host.

To transfer your domain to another domain host, you just need to provide them with the domain password (EPP code) which is O5LI29ZFq

 If you wish to keep using the Yellow Website after the domain transfer the new domain host will need to redirect the domain using the below settings. If not, you will need to request cancellation when you are ready.
Your new provider needs these details
